name: Imagine Him Happy
description:
Imagine Him Happy is a physics-based strand-type boulder-like anti-game, best compared to twisted creations like Getting Over It or Jump King.

You have one goal: push the boulder to the top of the mountain.

Imagine Him Happy is my entry for Ludum Dare 50 (Delay the Inevitable) in the compo division. All code and art assets were created by me in a weekend, excluding fonts.

Controls: WASD/Arrow Keys to move, Shift to sprint.

Didn't get around to doing any audio or music unfortunately so recommend you put some music on while playing :)
